summary: The document is a classified intelligence report from the Central Intelligence Agency, dated August 1962, detailing a planned uprising by Cuban opposition groups, including the Directorio Revolucionario Estudiantil (DRE), the Movimiento Revolucionario del Pueblo (MRP), and the Unidad Revolucionaria (UR), with the latter advised against participation by the French Embassy. The uprising aimed to incite a general uprising of all internal resistance groups in Cuba by the end of August 1962. The report underscores international intelligence cooperation, with information sourced from an official French service, and reflects the tense political climate in Cuba during the early 1960s. It includes handling instructions indicating it was not to be disseminated to foreign entities.
key_findings: Planned uprising by Cuban opposition groups in late August 1962.
Involvement of DRE, MRP, and UR in the planning, with UR advised against participation by the French Embassy.
The report highlights international intelligence cooperation, with information sourced from an official French service.
Indicates the tense political climate in Cuba during the early 1960s, reflecting opposition to the Cuban government.
